mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.user_id AS userId, b.character_id AS characterId, b.created_at AS createdAt, b.views, u.name AS userName, c.image_url AS characterImage FROM board b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id JOIN characters c ON b.character_id = c.id ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
